description:
Learn how to design a game for mobile devices. Find out how to rapidly
prototype a game by sketching concepts. Then define scope by creating a game
design document. Make your concepts into high fidelity assets by sketching out
scene and characters in Adobe Photoshop and creating scalable vector graphics
in Adobe Illustrator. Learn about working through game mechanics and animating
the game. We will even create sound effects and music for the game. Finally,
creating the start screen and an app icon.
title: Mobile Game Design
